column4: hi i am trying to load a package and this is what i'm typing apt-get git://git.opencompositing.org/fusion/plugins/atlantis......am i doing something wrong?
doesn't look like a valid apt-get command to me... you put in a url after the apt-get command, is that what you did? it's usually --> apt-get <package_name>
what package are you wanting to install?
the atlantis package for compiz...and that was the link posted on the compiz fusion community
ok, hang on a minute while i try and have a look
k...i would post a link to it..but its long and don't want to spam board
sorry but i don't know for. i will have to keep looking here for now...
sorry i know this is wrong chat for this...but does anyone here have a valid url to the atlantis package for compiz?
/msg me the link where this apt-get command is for atlantis if you can
Darth: lol sorry my keyboard is sticking
have a look at 'git'. git is a versioning control system. i think this atlantis plugin is for people want to download and compile bleeding edge source code
ahhh that would make sense...guess i will go back to looking for a different link
